SEARCH
Package com.example.queueup.viewmodels

Class EventViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.queueup.viewmodels.EventViewModel
public class EventViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel for managing event-related data and operations. Interacts with EventController to perform CRUD operations and exposes LiveData to the UI.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EventViewModel()
    Constructor initializes the EventController instance.

      Returns LiveData containing events filtered by organizer.

    • getEventsByAttendeeLiveData

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<Event>> getEventsByAttendeeLiveData()
      Returns LiveData containing events filtered by attendee.

      Returns LiveData containing details of a selected event.

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Boolean> getIsLoadingLiveData()
      Returns LiveData indicating loading states.

    • fetchAllEvents

      public void fetchAllEvents()
      Fetches all events from the database. Updates allEventsLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.

    • fetchEventsByOrganizer

      public void fetchEventsByOrganizer(String organizerId)
      Fetches events created by a specific organizer. Updates eventsByOrganizerLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      organizerId - The ID of the organizer.

    • fetchEventsByAttendee

      public void fetchEventsByAttendee(String attendeeId)
      Fetches events that a specific attendee is registered for. Updates eventsByAttendeeLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      attendeeId - The ID of the attendee.

    • fetchEventById

      public void fetchEventById(String eventId)
      Fetches details of a specific event by its ID. Updates selectedEventLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.

    • createEvent

      public void createEvent(Event newEvent)
      Creates a new event. Updates allEventsLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      newEvent - The Event object to be created.

    • updateEvent

      public void updateEvent(Event updatedEvent)
      Updates an existing event. Updates selectedEventLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      updatedEvent - The Event object with updated information.

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(String eventId)
      Deletes an event by its ID. Updates allEventsLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to be deleted.

    • reactivateEvent

      public void reactivateEvent(String eventId)
      Reactivates an event that was previously deactivated.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to reactivate.

    • endEvent

      public void endEvent(String eventId)
      Ends an event by setting its active status to false.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to end.

    • setEventBannerImage

      public void setEventBannerImage(String eventId, String imageUrl)
      Sets the banner image URL for a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      imageUrl - The URL of the banner image.

    • deleteEventsByUser

      public void deleteEventsByUser(String userId)
      Deletes all events created by a specific user. Updates allEventsLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose events are to be deleted.

    • registerToEvent

      public void registerToEvent(String eventId)
      Registers the current user to an event (joins the waiting list). Updates relevant LiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to register for.

    • unregisterFromEvent

      public void unregisterFromEvent(String eventId)
      Unregisters the current user from an event (leaves the waiting list). Updates relevant LiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to unregister from.

    • addAnnouncement

      public void addAnnouncement(String eventId, HashMap<String,String> announcement)
      Adds an announcement to a specific event. Updates announcementListLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      announcement - The announcement to add as a HashMap.

    • fetchAnnouncements

      public void fetchAnnouncements(String eventId)
      Fetches announcements for a specific event. Updates announcementListLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.

    • drawLottery

      public void drawLottery(String eventId, int numberToSelect)
      Draws a lottery to select a specified number of attendees from the waiting list. Updates relevant LiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      numberToSelect - The number of attendees to select.

    • handleReplacement

      public void handleReplacement(String eventId)
      Handles the replacement of an attendee if they decline the invitation.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.

    • clearErrorMessage

      public void clearErrorMessage()
      Clears the current error message.

    • fetchUserAnnouncements

      public void fetchUserAnnouncements(String eventId)
      Retrieves user announcements for a specific event. Updates announcementListLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.

    • checkInUser

      public void checkInUser(String eventId)
      Checks in a user to an event by updating their attendance status. Updates selectedEventLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
